snippet: The Justice Department has asked Florida to stop reviewing its voter rolls for potentially ineligible names, saying that the state appears to be in violation of federal election laws.
abstract: Justice Department asks Florida to stop searching for and purging the names of possible ineligible voters, saying that the state appears to be in violation of federal voter protection laws.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department has asked Florida to stop reviewing its voter rolls for potentially ineligible names, saying that the state appears to be in violation of federal election laws.

headline.seo: Justice Dept. Asks Florida to End Voter Purge
headline.main: Search for Illegal Voters May Violate Federal Safeguards, U.S. Tells Florida
headline.print_headline: Search for Illegal Voters May Violate Federal Safeguards, U.S. Tells Florida
